oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Side knife made by Wililam J. McElroy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Side knife marked "W.J. McElroy, Macon GA". William J. McElroy made all types of edged weapons and other metal items for the Confederate war effort. Located in Macon, Georgia, McElroy was a tinsmith before the war but quickly turned to manufacturing; items for the incipient Confederacy. He is most noted for making swords but also made side knives, spurs, buckles, belts, and canteens. McElroy's swords and knives ranked among the finest made in the Confederacy.
